caption.p: ( a) IES TM-30-18 Fidelity index ( R f) and gamut index ( R g) of the fabricated LEDs. Light grey region – Approximate limits for sources on the Planckian locus, Dark grey area – Approximate limits for practical light sources. ( b) The thermal stability of the PKG-2-1UV2B-GR LED under stress conditions–298 K, 378 K, and (378 K, 85% humidity).
